document.docTitle: Reductoonops naci Platnick & Berniker 2014, new species
document.masterDocTitle: ffle Neotropical goblin spiders of the new genus Reductoonops (Araneae, Oonopidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: ffle Neotropical goblin spiders of the new genus Reductoonops (Araneae, Oonopidae)

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Division of Invertebrate Zoology, American Museum of Natural History.
Division of Invertebrate Zoology, American Museum of Natural History.

subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPES: Male holotype , male paratype , female allotype , and two female paratypes taken from humus at an elevation of
950 m
in the Nacimiento Parque Municipal , 9°58′57″N , 84°10′28″W , Heredia , Costa Rica (
Jan. 27–28, 2010
; C. Víquez , B. Hernandez , A. Solis ), deposited in INBIO (PBI_OON 1618)
.
